cause.description:
Founded in 1959 by Sara O’Meara and Yvonne Fedderson, Childhelp® is a leading national non-profit organization dedicated to helping victims of child abuse and neglect. Childhelp’s approach focuses on prevention, intervention and treatment.
Each day in the United States, more than 4 children die as a result of child abuse, and child abuse is reported on average every 10 seconds - that's over 3 million reports per year.
By supporting Childhelp, you are playing a direct role in the treatment and prevention of child abuse.
90 cents of every dollar donated goes to programs helping children.
1. Support Childhelp programs that change the lives of abused and neglected children.
cause.mission: Childhelp exists to meet the physical, emotional, educational, & spiritual needs of abused and neglected children. We do so by focusing our efforts in the areas of treatment, prevention, & research.
cause.name: "For Love of a Child"
